pkgTutorial

Class G2Tutorial

  • java.lang.Object
    • pkgModel.Model
      • pkgModel.G2Model
        • pkgTutorial.G2Tutorial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class G2Tutorial
extends G2Model
    create the objects necessary for the tutorial for game 2.
    Author:
    Matthew Created 11/9/2019
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • G2Tutorial

        public G2Tutorial(boolean decision,
                  pkgModel.GameStatsModel gModel,
                  long currentTime,
                  double canvasWidth,
                  double canvasHeight,
                  double robotWidth,
                  double robotHeight,
                  double fishWidth,
                  double fishHeight,
                  double crustWidth,
                  double crustHeight,
                  int tool)
        G2Tutorial Constructor for the game2Tutorial objects
        Parameters:
        decision - boolean, used to tell the minigame which decision the player went with so it can impact the minigame.
        gModel - GameStatsModel, gameStatsModel to store scoring information between games
        currentTime - long, time in milliseconds that the game lasts
        canvasWidth - double, the canvas width of the javaFx window.
        canvasHeight - double, the canvas height of the javaFx window.
        robotWidth - double, width of the robot image to be drawn, used in the collision detection.
        robotHeight - double, height of the robot image to be drawn, used in the collision detection.
        fishWidth - double, width of the fish image, used in collision detection.
        fishHeight - double, height of the fish image, used in collision detection.
        crustWidth - double, width of the crustacean image, used in collision detection.
        crustHeight - double, height of the crustacean image, used in collision detection.
        tool - int, represents the tool that the player should start with

    • Method Detail

      • getTutorialChecklist

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getTutorialChecklist()
        returns the tutorialChecklist field which contains a Boolean arrayList that has to be all true for the tutorial to end
        Returns:
        the arrayList that contains all of the objectives that need to be completed to end the tutorial

      • setSlopeZero

        public void setSlopeZero(Animal animal)
        sets both slopes of the animal object used as an argumetn to 0.
        Parameters:
        animal - Animal object that both slopes (x and y) should be set to 0.

      • spawnNonInvasive

        public void spawnNonInvasive()
        spawn a non invasive species when called during the tutorial

      • takeAction

        public void takeAction(boolean takeAction,
                       double ClickOnPosX,
                       double ClickOnPosY)
        updates the fish / crustacean animation states.
        Overrides:
        takeAction in class G2Model
        Parameters:
        takeAction - boolean, determines if a photo or a net was swung
        ClickOnPosX - the mouse position that the robot should move to
        ClickOnPosY - the mouse position that the robot should move to

      • update

        public void update(double ClickOnPosX,
                   double ClickOnPosY,
                   boolean doAction,
                   int tool)
        updates the tutorial checkList if objectives were completed. updates the robot position and the animal positions.
        Parameters:
        ClickOnPosX - x position of mouse, where the robot moves to
        ClickOnPosY - y position of mouse, where the robot moves to
        doAction - true if the robot is taking a picture or capturing something
        tool - determines the tool that is selected by the robot.
